data.CHECKSUM_ERROR: This address is not [checksummed](https://support.mycrypto.com/troubleshooting/sending/not-checksummed-shows-when-i-enter-an-address). Please ensure you have copied & pasted the address. Never hand-type addresses.
data.CREATE_ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION_1: Your account accesses your crypto assets, which are stored on the blockchain.
data.CREATE_ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION_2: Each account has two parts: an address and a secret. Secrets come in many formats: a private key, a keystore file, or the recommended mnemonic phrase.
data.CREATE_ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION_3: Don’t worry, it’s easier than it sounds. You can do this!
data.CREATE_WALLET_WITH_KEYSTORE_BOTTOM_ACTIO: Don’t want to use a phrase?
data.DASHBOARD_ACCOUNTS_TOOLTIP: All of the accounts that you’ve added to your MyCrypto Dashboard will appear here. You can add an account by clicking “+ Add Account” below, or click on “Settings” to the right to manage them further.
data.DASHBOARD_ACCOUNT_SELECT_TOOLTIP: Use this Account Selector to display the balance of a single account, or the combined balances of any accounts you have added.
data.DASHBOARD_ACTIONS_BUY_ASSETS_SUBTITLE: Hassle-free ETH, delivered directly to your account
data.DASHBOARD_ACTIONS_GET_WALLET_SUBTITLE: Keep your assets safe by keeping them offline
data.DASHBOARD_ACTIONS_REQUEST_ASSETS_SUBTITL: Share your address or request a specific payment amount
data.DASHBOARD_ACTIONS_SEND_ASSETS_SUBTITLE: Send your assets from your account to another account
data.DASHBOARD_TOKENS_TOOLTIP: Use this area to view detailed information on the tokens in your account(s), scan for new tokens, or add tokens that aren’t on our default list.
data.DECRYPT_ACCESS: Kako bi želeli dostopati do vaše denarnice?
data.DEFIZAP_QUESTION_FIVE: How is the MyCrypto DeFiZap integration different from the functionality of DeFiZap.com?
data.DEFIZAP_QUESTION_FIVE_ANSWER: The MyCrypto DeFiZap integration uses the same process as the DeFiZap.com process. MyCrypto’s DeFiZap integration adds an extra layer of convenience by allowing you to access Zaps without having to leave MyCrypto. For the full list of available Zaps, visit [DeFiZap.com](https://defizap.com).
data.DEFIZAP_QUESTION_ONE_ANSWER: Short for decentralized finance, DeFi refers to financial services for crypto, such as borrowing, lending, and trading, that are usually facilitated using smart contracts on the blockchain. They are often open-source and noncustodial.
data.DEFIZAP_QUESTION_SEVEN: How do I see my DeFiZap balances?
data.DEFIZAP_QUESTION_SEVEN_ANSWER: Due to technical limitations, at this time we’re only currently able to give an estimate on some Zap balances, and DeFiZap recommends checking [pools.fyi](https://pools.fyi/) to view some of your balances/returns. Over time, as we and DeFiZap explore this further, we anticipate that there will be a better solution for this.
data.DEFIZAP_QUESTION_SIX: After entering a Zap, how do I exit?
data.DEFIZAP_QUESTION_SIX_ANSWER: To exit a Zap, please visit [DeFiZap.com](https://defizap.com), go to the Zap that you’re currently engaged with, and follow the steps that they outline.
data.DEFIZAP_QUESTION_THREE: Which protocols does DeFiZap interact with and where can I learn about them?
data.DEFIZAP_QUESTION_TWO_ANSWER: There's always risk when interacting with DeFi and smart contracts, and DeFiZap is an experimental project that is in beta. Using a service like DeFiZap to interact with protocols for you does add a small amount of additional risk, but most of the risk stems from the actual protocols that are being interacted with.
data.DEFI_DESC_FIRST: Zaps are created by none other than [DeFiZap](https://www.defizap.com)! With the intent to help users gain access to decentralized finance (“DeFi”) protocols, DeFiZap takes complicated processes and turns them into one-click solutions.
data.DEFI_DESC_SECOND: In addition to this easy entry into otherwise complicated DeFi protocols, it’s all noncustodial. You retain complete control of your funds and can manage everything manually if you’d like.
data.DEFI_DESC_THIRD: MyCrypto’s DeFiZap integration aims to take this one step further and allows one-step access to DeFi protocols without having to leave the comfort of your dashboard.
data.DOWNLOAD_APP_DESCRIPTION: Please download the MyCrypto Desktop app so you can securely complete creating your new account and start managing your funds.
data.DOWNLOAD_APP_FOOTER_INFO_LINK: Learn more about our desktop app.
data.DOWNLOAD_APP_FOOTER_LABEL: Have a private key, keystore file, or mnemonic phrase?

data.ENCLAVE_LEDGER_IN_USE: 현재 다른 앱에서 Ledger 지갑을 사용중입니다. 기다리시거나 사용 중인 다른 지갑 앱을 종료한 후 다시 시도해주세요.
data.ERROR_10: Please enter a valid gas price. (Must be integer. Try 20 GWEI (20000000000 WEI)
data.ERROR_11: Please enter a valid nonce      (Must be integer).
data.ERROR_3: This is not a valid wallet file.
data.ERROR_8: Please enter a valid gas limit  (Must be integer. Try 21000-4000000).
data.ERROR_9: Please enter a valid data value (Must be hex).
data.GASPRICE_ERROR: Please enter a valid gas price in gwei (Must be a number between 0.1 and 3000)
data.GAS_LIMIT_TOOLTIP: The Gas Limit is the maximum amount of ETH that is allowed to be used to send a transaction. Oftentimes, a transaction will not use all of this, and the remainder will be refunded. Most users do not need to modify this field. [Learn about Gas.](https://support.mycrypto.com/general-knowledge/ethereum-blockchain/what-is-gas)
data.GAS_PRICE_TOOLTIP: A higher Gas Price will ensure that a transaction is confirmed quicker, but it will also raise the Transaction Fee. Most users do not need to modify this field. [Learn about Gas.](https://support.mycrypto.com/general-knowledge/ethereum-blockchain/what-is-gas)
data.GENERIC_ERROR: Something went wrong! Please [email us]($link) so we can help you and fix this.
data.HIGH_TRANSACTION_FEE: This seems like a very high transaction fee. Are you sure you know what you are doing?

data.HOME_DOWNLOAD_DESCRIPTION: Keep your keys out of the browser with the MyCrypto Desktop App. You get more access to your funds, and scammers get less access to you.

data.INSECURE_WALLET_TYPE_DESC: $wallet_type 형식의 지갑은 온라인에서 사용할 수 없습니다. MyCrypto.com 사이트가 손상되었거나, 실수로 피싱 사이트에 방문하는 경우 당신의 자금을 모두 잃어버릴 수 있습니다. 이러한 이유때문에 저희는 웹 사이트에서 $wallet_type 형식의 지갑을 사용할 수 없게 해두었습니다. 계정에 접근하려면 MyCrypto 앱을 다운로드하여 로컬에서 실행하시길 바랍니다.

data.MAKE_BACKUP_DESCRIPTION_1: Remember, a **private key** + a **password** = a **keystore file.**
data.MAKE_BACKUP_DESCRIPTION_2: Make a backup of your **private key** in case you ever lose your **keystore file.**
data.MAKE_BACKUP_DESCRIPTION_3: We recommend you print it out twice and store them in two separate, safe, and secret locations. Do not share them with others, save them online, or take a photo of them.
data.MEMBERSHIP_ERROR: Cannot detect membership status. Please refresh the page or try again. If problem persists, contact [support@mycrypto.com](mailto:support@mycrypto.com)
data.MEMBERSHIP_NOTMEMBER: Support MyCrypto and become a member!
data.MEMBERSHIP_STEP1_TEXT: Before purchasing a membership with DAI, you must approve the membership contract to execute the transaction.
data.MEMBERSHIP_STEP2_TEXT: The contract you approved will complete the membership purchase as soon as you confirm the transaction below.
data.METAMASK_PERMISSION_DENIED: You denied the request for permission to access MetaMask, but permission is required to unlock your wallet. Please click "Connect to MetaMask", and then click "Approve" when the dialog opens.
data.MNEMONIC_GENERATE_PHRASE_DESCRIPTION_1: A **Mnemonic Phrase** is a list of 12 words (below) and is the **secret** to unlocking your account and accessing your crypto assets.
data.MNEMONIC_GENERATE_PHRASE_DESCRIPTION_2: **Don’t lose it.** It can’t be recovered if you lose it.
data.MNEMONIC_GENERATE_PHRASE_DESCRIPTION_3: **Don’t share it.** Your funds will be stolen if you use this file on a malicious site.
data.MNEMONIC_HELP: Not working? [Here's some troubleshooting tips to try](https://support.mycrypto.com/how-to/accessing-wallet/how-to-access-your-wallet-with-mnemonic-phrase)
data.MNEMONIC_MAKE_BACKUP_DESCRIPTION: Write down your **Mnemonic Phrase** on two pieces of paper. Store them in two separate, safe, and secret locations. Do not share them with others, save them online, or take a photo of them.
data.MNEMONIC_TOOL_TIP: If you created a Mnemonic Phrase on another website, you may have a password for this account
data.MNEMONIC_VERIFY_DESCRIPTION: Select each word in order to ensure you backed up your Mnemonic Phrase properly.
data.NETWORK_TOOLTIP: A network is also known as a blockchain. Most users are here to manage their Ethereum accounts, so this selection defaults to the Ethereum network. [Learn about the other networks that MyCrypto supports.](https://support.mycrypto.com/developers/adding-a-new-network)
data.NEW_FOOTER_TEXT_13: MyCrypto is an open-source, client-side tool for generating ether wallets, handling ERC-20 tokens, and interacting with the blockchain more easily. Developed by and for the community since 2015, we’re focused on building awesome products that put the power in people’s hands.
data.NEW_FOOTER_TEXT_14: Your email was added to our mailing list!
data.NEW_FOOTER_TEXT_4: Get updates from MyCrypto straight to your inbox!
data.NEW_MEMBER: You are now a MyCrypto Member!
data.NEW_WALLET_KEYSTORE_DESCRIPTION_2: Enter a strong, easy-to-remember **password** to create your **keystore file.** This password will encrypt your **private key.** It is not used as a seed.
data.NEW_WALLET_KEYSTORE_DESCRIPTION_3: **Don’t forget your password.** You will need the password and your keystore file to access your account in the future.
data.NONCE_ERROR: Please double-check your nonce. If this error persists, please email [support@mycrypto.com]($link)
data.NONCE_TOOLTIP: The nonce is the number of transactions sent from a given address and its purpose is to prevent double spending. [Learn more about nonce.](https://support.mycrypto.com/general-knowledge/ethereum-blockchain/what-is-nonce)
data.NOTIFICATIONS_GET_WALLET_DESCRIPTION: Keep your funds safe offline with Trezor or Ledger.

data.NOTIFICATIONS_PRINT_WALLET_DESCRIPTION:
Ensure you never lose access to your assets. 
 Print your paper wallet and store it somewhere safe.
data.NOTIFICATIONS_SAVE_DASHBOARD_DESCRIPTION: You've spent a lot of time customizing your dashboard. Make sure to back it up so you don’t lose your settings.
data.NOTIFICATIONS_WALLET_ADDED_DESCRIPTION: Your account with the address **$address** has been successfully added!

data.NOTIFICATIONS_WALLET_DESCRIPTION_ADD: Your dashboard now shows all your accounts and their balances. Use the “All Accounts” dropdown to filter your accounts. Or, check out some other helpful resources.
data.NOTIFICATIONS_WALLET_NOT_ADDED_DESCRIPTI: Your account with the address **$address** could not be successfully added. This can be due to an invalid network being selected, or if the account is already present on your dashboard.
data.NOTIFICATIONS_WALLET_NOT_ADDED_TITLE: Your account could not be added.

data.PRIVATE_KEY_HELP: Not working? [Here's some troubleshooting tips to try.](https://support.mycrypto.com/troubleshooting/accessing-wallet/private-key-not-working)
data.PROTECTED_TX_NOT_WEB3_WALLET_DESC: Once you confirm and sign the transaction, you'll have 20 seconds to cancel sending if you change your mind. Still not convinced? Learn more.
data.PROTECTED_TX_REPORT_FOOTER_TEXT_NOT_WEB3: Upon confirming and sending the transaction, you'll get $20seconds to cancel if you change your mind.
data.PROTECTED_TX_WEB3_WALLET_DESC: Due to technical limitations, the 20 second cancellation timer is unavailable for transactions using $web3WalletName and other Web 3 providers.
data.RECENT_TX_LIST_NO_TRANSACTIONS: Your MyCrypto Transactions Will Appear Here!
data.RECENT_TX_LIST_NO_TRANSACTIONS_MORE: You can send ETH or Tokens with any of your accounts on MyCrypto to see your transactions.
data.REQUEST_FORM_TOOLTIP: Share this QR code with the party who will be fulfilling the payment request. The party will need to scan the QR code with their preferred crypto app. We recommend [Ambo.io!](https://ambo.io/)
data.RISK_REWARD_COLLATERALIZATION: **Collateralization:** If the crypto price swings, you don’t get liquidated nor does the entire system collapse.
data.RISK_REWARD_DIVERSIFICATION: **Diversification:** Expand your investment portfolio leveraging your ETH.
data.RISK_REWARD_INNOVATION: **Innovation:** Take advantage of innovative decentralized tools avaiable to ETH holders.
data.RISK_REWARD_INVESTING: **Investing:** Put your ETH to work for you with potential to watch your money grow.
data.RISK_REWARD_LIQUIDITY: **Liquidity:** Markets are less efficient when they are more shallow.
data.RISK_REWARD_SMART_CONTRACT: **Smart Contract:** There is a chance that smart contracts get hacked and you lose all your money.
data.SAFET_MINI_DESCRIPTION: Afer you've connected, follow the instructions on screen to access your account.
data.SAVE_KEYSTORE_DESCRIPTION_1: **Don't lose it.** It can't be recovered if you lose it.
data.SAVE_KEYSTORE_DESCRIPTION_2: **Don't share it.** Your funds will be stolen if you use this on a malicious site.
data.SAVE_KEYSTORE_DESCRIPTION_3: **Keep it offline.** Your funds are safest offline (on a USB drive or something similar). We don't recommend keeping your file on any cloud services like Dropbox, Google Drive, etc.
data.SCREEN_LOCK_FORGOT_PASSWORD_ADDITIONAL_D: You can import your MyCrypto Settings to regain access to your wallet. If you don't have your MyCrypto Settings, you can start from scratch and re-import your accounts.
data.SCREEN_LOCK_FORGOT_PASSWORD_DESCRIPTION: Unlike the traditional, centralized web, we cannot recover your password.
data.SCREEN_LOCK_LOCKED_DESCRIPTION: We’ve detected that you have a MyCrypto wallet already. Type in your password to continue.
data.SCREEN_LOCK_LOCKED_RECOMMEND_LOCK: Why do we recommend screen lock?
data.SCREEN_LOCK_LOCKED_WRONG_PASSWORD: Sorry, that is not the correct screen lock password. You created this password on MyCrypto when you first set up your Screen Lock. It is not the password you use for your keystore file or mnemonic phrase.
data.SCREEN_LOCK_LOCKING_DESCRIPTION: You’ve been inactive for $inactive_time. In order to keep your funds safe, Your Wallet will be automatically locked in
data.SCREEN_LOCK_LOCKING_ON_DEMAND_DESCRIPTIO: You've chosen to manually lock Your Wallet. In order to keep your funds safe, Your Wallet will be locked in
data.SCREEN_LOCK_NEW_DESCRIPTION: We want to help you keep your funds safe! Please create a password so you can securly view your wallet when you come back to MyCrypto.
data.SCREEN_LOCK_NEW_HEADING: Create Password to Lock Your Wallet
data.SELECT_NETWORK_DESCRIPTION: Select the blockchain that you want to operate with. Not sure what to choose? Stick with the default choice below and click next.
data.SENDER_TOOLTIP: MyCrypto allows you to send from any of the accounts you have added. Please select the account you’d like to send from.
data.SENDING_TO_BURN_ADDRESS: This address appears to be a “burn” address. Please be absolutely sure you wish to send to this address. There is no way to reverse a transaction.
data.SENDING_TO_YOURSELF: You are sending to yourself. Are you sure you want to do that?
data.SETTINGS_DANGER_ZONE_TOOLTIP: So fresh and so clean clean! Clears all stored information within the app. You will lose all settings, addresses, accounts, and information if you click this button.
data.SETTINGS_EXPORT_INFO: Your MyCrypto settings file is ready.
data.SETTINGS_IMPORT_COPY: Upload the MyCrypto settings file that you previously exported
data.SETTINGS_IMPORT_INVALID: The file you've selected is not a MyCrypto Settings JSON file. Please select the proper file.
data.SETTINGS_IMPORT_PASTE: or drop your MyCrypto Settings file here.
data.SETTINGS_IMPORT_SUCCESS: You will see the imported files in settings!
data.SETTINGS_INACTIVITY_TOOLTIP: The amount of time before your the MyCrypto screen app locks.
data.SETTINGS_TOOLTIP: Your MyCrypto Settings include the Accounts in your MyCrypto Wallet, your Saved Address, and other preferences. We will only export or import your MyCrypto Settings. This does not include private keys and exporting is not a way to backup private keys.
data.SIGNER_SELECT_WALLET_QR: Open your $walletId app on your phone and scan the QR code.
data.SIGN_MESSAGE_DESCRIPTION: To sign a message, please unlock your account first. Select from the options below.
data.SIGN_MESSAGE_ERROR: There was a problem signing a message. Please try again.
data.SIGN_MSG_PLACEHOLDER: 서명된 메시지는 당신이 주소를 소유하고 있다는 것을 말해줍니다.
data.SIGN_TX_EXPLANATION: Because we never save, store, or transmit your secret, you need to sign each transaction in order to send it. MyCrypto puts YOU in control of your assets.
data.SIGN_TX_HARDWARE_FAILED_1: You denied the transaction signature request, or the transaction signature request timed out. Please confirm the transaction signature.
data.SIGN_TX_HELP_LINK: Not working? [Here's some troubleshooting tips to try]($helpLink).
data.SIGN_TX_KEYSTORE_WRONG_FILE: The uploaded keystore file's public address does not match transaction's sender address, please upload correct keystore file.
data.SIGN_TX_LEDGER_DESCRIPTION: Connect your Ledger to your computer and select the Network application to sign your transaction.
data.SIGN_TX_SAFE_T_MINI_DESCRIPTION: Connect your Safe-T Mini to your computer and enter your Safe-T Mini PIN when prompted to sign your transaction.
data.SIGN_TX_TITLE: Sign the Transaction with your $walletName wallet
data.SIGN_TX_TREZOR_DESCRIPTION: Connect your Trezor to your computer and enter your Trezor PIN when prompted to sign your transaction.
data.SIGN_TX_WALLETCONNECT_CONFIRM_PROMPT: Please confirm the transaction on your wallet
data.SIGN_TX_WALLETCONNECT_FAILED_ACCOUNT: Please switch the account in your $walletName app to $address in order to proceed.
data.SIGN_TX_WALLETCONNECT_FAILED_NETWORK: Please switch the network in your $walletName app to $networkName in order to proceed.
data.SIGN_TX_WALLETCONNECT_INSTRUCTIONS_1: 1. Open the wallet containing the account
data.SIGN_TX_WEB3_FAILED_ACCOUNT: Please switch the account in $walletName to $address in order to proceed.
data.SIGN_TX_WEB3_FAILED_NETWORK: Please switch the network in $walletName to $networkName in order to proceed.
data.SIGN_TX_WEB3_PROMPT: Sign into $walletName on your computer and follow the instructions in the $walletName window.
data.SIGN_TX_WEB3_REJECTED: Transaction has been rejected or there was an error. Please restart send-flow
data.SWAP_ACCOUNT_SELECT_DESC: Where will you be sending your $fromAsset from? You will receive your $toAsset back to the same address after the swap.
data.SWAP_FEE_TOOLTIP: This fee is split between MyCrypto and Dex.AG
data.SWAP_INTRO: To begin your swap process, we’ll first help you sell your ETH. We will walk you through the process below.
data.SWAP_MARKUP_TOOLTIP: Markup determines how good of a deal you're getting, according to available liquidity.
data.SWAP_SELECT_ACCOUNT_TOOLTIP: MyCrypto allows you to send from any of the accounts you have added. Please select the account you’d like to send from.
data.SWAP_STEP1_TEXT: Before swapping a token, you must approve the swap contract to execute the transaction.
data.SWAP_STEP2_TEXT: The contract you approved will complete the swap contract as soon as you confirm the transaction below.
data.SWAP_ZERO_VALUE: Make sure you are inputting a value greater than 0.
data.TOKEN_SEND_TOOLTIP: Whenever you send a token on the Ethereum blockchain, you’re actually sending a request to the token contract to move the tokens around. This doesn’t require any extra action from you, but this is why you see this additional information.
data.TO_FIELD_ERROR: Enter a valid address, ENS name, or blockchain domain
data.TRANSACTION_BROADCASTED_DESC: Your transaction has been sent to the network to be mined. Your assets will typically be sent in ~15 seconds, as long as the network is not busy and there is not an error in the transaction. Read More: [Error in Transaction, Network is Not Busy](https://support.mycrypto.com/troubleshooting/sending/transactions-not-showing-or-pending)
data.TRANS_AUTO_GAS_TOGGLE: Calculer automatiquement la limite en gaz
data.TREZOR_HELP: Not working? [Here's some troubleshooting tips to try](https://support.mycrypto.com/troubleshooting/hardware-wallets/trezor/unable-to-connect-trezor-hardware-wallet-on-mycrypto)
data.TREZOR_TIP: After you've connected, follow the instructions on screen to access your account.
data.U2F_NOT_SUPPORTED: Le standard U2F que les portefeuilles physiques utilisent ne semble pas supporté par votre navigateur. Veuillez réessayer en utilisant Google Chrome.
data.UNEXPECTED_ERROR: Something went wrong. Please refresh this page and try again or contact us at $link
data.UNLOCK_PROTOCOL_DONATOR_DESCRIPTION: Your donation will go towards maintaining and upgrading this website as well as our other products!
data.UNLOCK_PROTOCOL_DONATOR_DESCRIPTION_ADD: Are you confused? We noticed that you donated to us using [Unlock Protocol](https://unlock-protocol.com). In the future, we will make features just for you and philanthropists like you!
data.UNLOCK_PROTOCOL_DONATOR_TITLE: Thank you for donating to MyCrypto!
data.VERIFY_KEYSTORE_DESCRIPTION: Select your keystore file or enter your private key to ensure you have it backed up properly.
data.VERIFY_KEYSTORE_EMPTY_FORM_ERROR:
Please select your keystore file or enter your 
 private key.
data.VERIFY_KEYSTORE_TITLE: Verify Keystore File or Private Key
data.VERIFY_MESSAGE_DESCRIPTION: To verify a message, please paste a signature below.
data.VIEW_ONLY_WARNING_TOOLTIP: Note: You cannot send from a view-only account.
data.WALLET_BREAKDOWN_NO_ASSETS_MORE: You can [buy some ETH](https://buy.mycrypto.com/) with your credit card to get started!
data.WALLET_DISABLED: This wallet type is disabled on MyCrypto.com. Please download the MyCrypto Desktop App.
data.WARN_SEND_LINK: You arrived via a link that has the address, value, gas, data fields, or transaction type (send mode) filled in for you. You can change any information before sending. Unlock your wallet to get started.
data.ZAPS_AVAIL: MyCrypto’s DeFiZap integration will initially allow you to access three Zaps:
data.ZAPS_AVAIL_COMPOUND_POOL: Compound Dai Pool: Swaps 100% of ETH for DAI (using Kyber Network) and contributes it to Compound.
data.ZAPS_AVAIL_DAI_UNIPOOL: DAI Unipool: Swaps 50% of ETH for DAI (using Uniswap) and contributes both ETH & DAI to Uniswap DAI Pool.
data.ZAPS_AVAIL_NOTIF: We’ll be working to add more Zaps over time, but you can access all of the Zaps via [DeFiZap.com](https://defizap.com).
data.ZAPS_AVAIL_SETH_UNIPOOL: sETH Unipool: Swaps 50% of ETH for sETH (using Uniswap) and contributes both ETH & sETH to the Uniswap sETH Pool.
data.ZAP_BALANCE_DETECTED: This zap is active in one or more of your accounts.
data.ZAP_BALANCE_TOOLTIP: We've detected that you have a balance on the $protocol protocol.
data.ZAP_BANNER_DESCRIPTION: You have selected to open a position with the following Zap:
data.ZAP_COMPOUND_DAI_POOL_BULLETPOINT_ONE: Remove your exposure to changes in the price of ETH.
data.ZAP_COMPOUND_DAI_POOL_BULLETPOINT_TWO: Contribute your DAI to a money market protocol to earn interest of up to 8% a year.
data.ZAP_COMPOUND_DAI_POOL_DESCRIPTION: Earn interest of up to 8% a year by contributing to the Compound money market protocol. Remove your ETH price exposure.
data.ZAP_COMPOUND_TOOLTIP: This zap stores funds in the Compound money market protocol
data.ZAP_CONFIRM_DISCLAIMER: Remember, there are no guarantees that you will make money if you do this. Please review the risks you are taking on [here](https://support.mycrypto.com/). You may also review the DeFi Zap protocols [here](https://defizap.com/zaps).
data.ZAP_DAI_UNIPOOL_BULLETPOINT_ONE: Reduce your exposure to changes in the price of ETH.
data.ZAP_DAI_UNIPOOL_BULLETPOINT_TWO: Earn interest by lending to the DAI pool on the Uniswap exchange protocol.
data.ZAP_DAI_UNIPOOL_DESCRIPTION: Hedge against ETH price volatility and earn a variable interest rate (generally 5-25%) by lending on the Uniswap exchange protocol.
data.ZAP_DASHBOARD_PANEL_HEADER: Put your ETH to work for you
data.ZAP_RISKS_HEADER: Risks and Rewards when using DeFi Zap
data.ZAP_SETH_UNIPOOL_BULLETPOINT_TWO: Earn interest by lending to the Synthetic ETH pool on the Uniswap exchange protocol.
data.ZAP_SETH_UNIPOOL_DESCRIPTION: Preserve your ETH price exposure and earn a variable interest rate (generally 1-2%) by lending on the Uniswap exchange protocol.
data.ZAP_UNISWAP_TOOLTIP: This zap stores funds in the Uniswap exchange protocol
